title: Malaysia: land of contrasts
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Asia - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Temples - Asia, Southeastern
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Temples - Asia, Southeastern
description: Episode of Series "A Travellers' guide to the Orient". A two part tour of Malaysia. Part 1: Kuala Lumpur, Cameron Highlands, Kuantan & Terengganu. A survey of the temples, shopping centres and gardens of the Malaysian capital, Kuala Lumpur; the jungle walks and hill stations of the Cameron Highlands, and the beautiful beaches of Pahang, Kuantan and Terengganu. Part 2: Penang, Ipoh, Genting Highlands, Negeri Sembilan & Melaka. The tour continues through the cities of Penang, Ipoh and Melaka and the palaces and castles of Negeri Sembilan and the Genting Highlands.
